issue.title: [C++] Add ORC support on windows
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17817](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17817). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
ORC support is explicitly disabled in the CmakeLists.txt file, which prevents us to compile Arrow with ORC support on windows (MSVC). The aim will be to remove this limitation.
